column1: Funeral services will be held at the Parsley Bottom Freewill Baptist Church Tuesday June 23
column2: 2015 at 1:00pm with Rev. Mike Smith officiating. Burial will follow in the Dempsey Cemetery at Lenore
column3: WV. Visitation will be at the Church from 6:00pm with special services starting at 7:00pm on Monday evening. Pallbearers will be friends and family.
